//klopt de rij heen/terug
//heen
//2 4 6 8#2,4,6,8,10#10
//4 6 8 10#4,6,8,10,12#12
//6 8 10 12#6,8,10,12,14#14

//18 20 22 24#18,20,22,24,26#26

62 64 66 68#62,64,66,68,70#70
